name: Next.js Middleware レート制限ヘッダ 最小
description: X-RateLimit-* を付与する概念最小

files.template:
import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
export function middleware(){ const res = NextResponse.next(); res.headers.set('X-RateLimit-Limit','60'); res.headers.set('X-RateLimit-Remaining','59'); return res; }
